projectDescription: Local-first project management webapp with autonomous AI execution
codingStyle: Clean, typed TypeScript with functional patterns. Use async/await. Prefer composition over inheritance. Keep functions small and focused.

howToTest.notes: Run tests after each change. Ensure type safety. Follow linting rules.

howToRun.notes: Development server on port 3000. Build before production deployment.

guardrails: No file deletions without explicit task requirement
Restrict shell commands to package managers and test runners
No network requests to unknown endpoints

folders.plans: Planning artifacts and project management data

repoConventions.naming: kebab-case for files and folders, PascalCase for components, camelCase for functions
